snippet.title: Void Martyrs - Exclusive Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Check out this exclusive Void Martyrs reveal trailer! Ever played as a nun in a game before? You will in Void Martyrs, a grimdark, top-down action game in which you are sent on a crusade to recover treasured relics at the edge of a blackhole, only to face off against those affected by a biomechanical plague. The Stigmata/Faith system will give consequence to your gameplay choices. Wishlist it on Steam if you're interested: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3470850/Void_Martyrs/

#Gaming #IGN #VoidMartyrs
